name: Frogenstein
description:
Space frog vs space birds in an infinite castle.

This game uses standard WASD move and mouse look.

Made for the DigifestSouth 2016 game jam, whose theme was "Game of Frogs." This game is an arcade shooter inspired by Wolfenstein 3D. Kill as many enemies as you can, or race to the highest floor you can through procedural levels.

Modsme did the programming, while Trent Robichaux was the pixel artist and sound artist.
